title: HIM Discography Vbr Mp3 + Vids
description:
HIM aka His Infernal Majesty

is a Finnish rock band from Helsinki. Formed in 1991 by vocalist Ville Valo, guitarist Mikko "Linde" LindstrÃƒÂ¶m, and bassist Mikko "MigÃƒÂ©" Paananen,[2] HIM's current lineup consists of Valo, Linde, MigÃƒÂ©, Janne "Emerson Burton" Puurtinen on keyboards and Mika Karppinen on drums. They have released seven full-length albums to date and are currently working on their eighth, titled Tears on Tape, to be released in 2013. On September 5, 2006, HIM's fifth studio album Dark Light was certified gold by the RIAA, making HIM the first Finnish band to have a gold album in the United States.[3] HIM had five of their studio albums certified platinum in Finland with Razorblade Romance being certified double platinum in Finland and platinum in Germany.[4]
